body_content.explanation: the activity of going around a public place picking up litter (= small pieces of rubbish lying on the ground) :
examples: Those who can't afford the price of a ticket can obtain a pass in exchange for mucking in with jobs such as litter picking.
Bin bags and litter picking sticks will be provided.
The punishment included up to seven hours a week of community work, such as decorating and litter-picking.
